title: Pingston - Middle
whats_it_like: Excellent quality class 4 with a few bigger rapids near the end. Continuous without being pushy, clean read and run for the first 3/4 with reasonably easy scouting and portaging options for the bigger rapids

difficulty.text: IV with a short V section at the end

scouting_portaging: Lots of eddies and reasonably easy scouting/portaging at river level (no canyon sections)

time.original: 2-3 hours (more or less depending on your boat scouting comfort level)
